projects.name: Chatbot
projects.description: A Boredom Buddy Chatbot who is there for even your most boring days

projects.name: Weather app
projects.description: A site to display the weather with the help of an API-call. With an option to also search for a specifically wanted city. The site also displays the forecast of coming five days.

projects.name: Business Site
projects.description: A business-site for Balanced Body studios. The site uses HTML to create a form and then post the answers to http-bin.

projects.name: Groovenest
projects.description: This is a site that displays some of the latest albums released on Spotify.

projects.name: On Book Library
projects.description: This site displays an array of books you are able to sort and filter by plenty of choices but also search up the one you are most interested in

projects.name: Paw Pop
projects.description: A quiz site, where you can take a quiz and earn points by answerig questions about some of the cutest animals.
